comments:
Build 3.0M9

When attempting to import from ZIP into a project, an error dialog opens 
indicating the source file is invalid.

The zipfile is attached to bug 63432 (comment 8). Direct URL to it should be:
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/attachment.cgi?id=11016&action=view

This works on Linux fails on Win32.  Seems to be a problem with Win32 JDKs (sun 
& ibm).
java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file HTTPClient.ZIP
        at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
        at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:127)
        at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:92)
...
See Sun bug# 4776464 (ZipFile refuses to open valid ZIP files.)

The only workaround is to re-zip the file using a "more" standard 
implementation like zip, etc...

We can only guarantee zips created by the java.util.zip API - otherwise it is 
in a format that java.util.zip may not recognise.

This is a VM issue.

traces.message: error in opening zip file HTTPClient.ZIP
